welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elmhurst, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, diverse cuisine, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving mainly United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving mainly Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving mainly American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal with domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Secondary terminal with mainly domestic flights

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'DPA Airport WiFi' from their device's list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and shipping operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.
